name: Stay Strong
description:
Hi! Thank you for playing this game.

One of the world's problems is war. 

During these terrible occurrences, many people have to change their usual place of life.

In the fantasy world of the game, take on the role of the mayor of the city, building buildings and providing people with the necessary things.

This game was created to participate in the "Games Job Fair Spring 2023 - Unity Engine Programming Challenge".

It's not mandatory! But I'd appreciate it if you could spare a few coins for the "Come Back Alive" charity fund.
